summary:
Manga is a type of comic or graphic novel that comes from Japan. It has a long history and is very popular there, with people of all ages reading it. Manga covers many genres, like action, comedy, and romance. It's also become popular worldwide, with many translated versions.

Manga is often printed in black and white to keep costs down and is usually published in magazines with several stories. These stories are then collected into books called tank≈çbon. Manga artists work with editors to create these stories, and popular ones might get turned into anime.
title: Manga
